name: Stupidity Sandbox
description:
Bored? Like explosions, guns, and stuff? 

You came to the wrong place. This is a stupid game. Go get Gmod or something.

Fine. You can play this. 

Mess around with building, islands, explosions, guns, and even nukes! Paint stuff, drive cars, build houses, nuke places, crash cars, and especially BLOW STUFF UP! With a plethora of things at your disposal, including a spawner/gravity gun, a property gun which allows you to edit mass, size, and bomb countdowns, and a spray tool to paint stuff, your afternoon can easily be squandered away with this silly little sandbox.

CONTROLS: WASD+SPACE to move+jump, L+R arrow keys to switch weapons, TAB on any of the creative tools to open their menu, ESC for pause menu.

J+K to rotate stuff you picked up

X to delete stuff (when holding GravityGun)

E to pickup stuff (if you have fists/gravitygun equipped)

Z to spawn a thing after you select it

Q to interact with some stuff (makes bombs count down too)

G to enter vehicle

An unfinished project I released for some reason. Basically a Gmod ripoff lol.
